system.description: The character is trained in detecting and destroying daemonic entities, with enhanced senses and combat effectiveness against such foes.
system.benefit: Character can re-roll failed Awareness and Psyniscience tests to detect the presence of Daemons. Additionaly their attacks against Daemons gain the Proven (3) Quality.

specialAbilities.name: Daemonhunter
specialAbilities.description: You can re-roll failed Awareness and Psyniscience tests to detect the presence of Daemons. Additionally, your attacks against Daemons gain the Proven (3) Quality.
